messages.message:
Brian,

I am working on a construction project on campus (across the street from the library) and have been tasked with researching audio visual systems (specifically digital vs analog).

I guessed that, because of your computer knowledge, you might have some helpful information for me.  Are you familiar with the benefits/drawbacks of both systems?  Costs?  If so, is there a time we can meet up, maybe over lunch, and discuss this?

Thanks,
Scott Robinson

858-449-3074

Brian
I am somewhat familiar with digital and analog hardware, I spent some time working for KJACK the radio station on campus.  What are you trying to accomplish?  Digital is generally more expensive, but supports a lot of different types of signals, including HD.  I should be able to help you find the information you need.  I will be free after work today and tomorrow, we could meet up at Lumberyard or something for a beer if you like.  I will have my internet enabled phone, but you may want to use a laptop to look up information.

Shoot me a text or something to confirm,
Brian Cullinan

614-425-6054
